attributes.action: Reintroduce capital punishment for heinous crimes.
attributes.additional_details: Some crimes are so heinous that the ultimate punishment is moral and just. I would like Government/ Parliament to hold a referendum regarding this.
attributes.background: Reintroduction of capital punishment for heinous crimes. The crime would need to reach certain requirements (special circumstances), and after guilt is found the jury would decide between life without parole or capital punishment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
